name: Norg
description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

name: Cuthol
description: A grotesque crustacean that produces a potent, paralyzing toxin from its tentacles.

name: Cuthol
description: A grotesque crustacean that produces a potent, paralyzing toxin from its tentacles.

name: Cuthol
description: A grotesque crustacean that produces a potent, paralyzing toxin from its tentacles.

name: Tear Azurite
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Azurite
description: A blue gem layered with impurities.

name: Esher Devar
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Devar
description: A cloudy crystal.

name: Pyrotic Alloy
description: Pyrol that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Pyrol
description: A tarnished, brittle metal.

name: Coprite Alloy
description: Coprun that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Coprun
description: A soft, malleable metal.

name: Radian Sentirum
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Sentirum
description: A rare Eidolon Gem, created from the fossilized blood of an ancient Sentient.

name: Heart Nyth
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Nyth
description: A rare local Gem, formed when the gas known as Breath of the Eidolon becomes trapped in molten iradite.

name: Star Crimzian
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Crimzian
description: A blood-red gem.

name: Auroxium Alloy
description: Auron that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Auron
description: A brilliant, dense and conductive metal.

name: Marquise Veridos
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Veridos
description: A highly reflective, green gem.

name: Fersteel Alloy
description: Ferros that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Ferros
description: A resilient metal that is hardened by the inpurities within it.

name: Madurai Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

name: Eidolon Madurai Lens
description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

name: Vazarin Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Vazarin Way.

name: Eidolon Vazarin Lens
description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Vazarin Way.

name: Zenurik Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Zenurik Way.

name: Eidolon Zenurik Lens
description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Zenurik Way.

name: Naramon Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Naramon Way.

name: Eidolon Naramon Lens
description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Naramon Way.

name: Unairu Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Unairu Way.

name: Eidolon Unairu Lens
description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Unairu Way.

name: Odonata Prime
description: This enhanced version of the first Archwing prototype takes the design to its theoretical limits.

abilities.name: Energy Shell
abilities.description: Forms a protective energy shell around the Warframe

abilities.name: Disarray
abilities.description: Drops flare beacons confusing incoming guided missiles.

abilities.name: Seeking Fire
abilities.description: Fires a large volley of homing missiles.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description: The Warframe emits a massive pulse of energy, stunning nearby enemies and sending them flying.

name: Imperator Vandal
description: The Imperator Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the barrel.

name: Volt Prime
description: A glorious warrior from the past, Volt Prime features the same abilities as Volt but with unique mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Shock
abilities.description: Launches a shocking projectile. It stuns and deals high damage to a single target and chains damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Speed
abilities.description: Gain a brief boost of movement speed which affects all allies in range.

abilities.name: Electric Shield
abilities.description: Volt deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.

abilities.name: Discharge
abilities.description: Paralyze nearby hostiles with a damaging electric charge, this also shocks approaching enemies.

name: Trinity Prime
description: Become the bastion that defends allies using powerful healing abilities with Trinity Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Well Of Life
abilities.description: Create a well of life on an enemy. Allies will gain health when damaging the target.

abilities.name: Energy Vampire
abilities.description: Allies will gain energy over time when enemies are marked with Energy Vampire.

abilities.name: Link
abilities.description: Any damage taken while Link is active will be channeled to a nearby enemy.

abilities.name: Blessing
abilities.description: Restore the health and shields of allies within Trinity's affinity aura while giving them some damage resistance.

name: Vauban Prime
description: Transform the battlefield into a weapon with this gilded tactician. Features unique mod polarities for extended customization.

abilities.name: Tesla
abilities.description: Launches a grenade that holds an electrical charge, zapping enemies that come within range.

abilities.name: Minelayer
abilities.description: Cycle through four deployable trap mines: Bounce, Trip Laser, Shred and Concuss.

abilities.name: Bastille
abilities.description: Creates an energy-based containment field in which captives are held suspended in stasis.

abilities.name: Vortex
abilities.description: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter

name: Zephyr Prime
description: Take to the skies with this golden bird of destruction.

abilities.name: Tail Wind
abilities.description: From the ground, charge and release to launch Zephyr into an airborne hover. From the air, tap to dash forward, or aim down to dive bomb enemies below.

abilities.name: Airburst
abilities.description: Generate a burst of massively dense air that explodes on contact and sends enemies flying. Launch Airbursts into Tornadoes to make them grow.

abilities.name: Turbulence
abilities.description: Creates a wind shield around Zephyr, redirecting all incoming projectiles.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description: Create deadly tornadoes that seek out and engulf enemies. Tornadoes deal the elemental damage type they absorb the most. Shoot enemies engulfed in Tornadoes to do additional damage.

name: Saryn Prime
description: A golden blossom conceals deadly nectar. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Spores
abilities.description: Inflict a target with a pox of <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive spores. Spread spores to nearby enemies by destroying them or killing their host. The longer the Spore spreads, its damage will increase.

abilities.name: Molt
abilities.description: Shedding her skin like a snake, Saryn leaves a decoy behind to draw fire from enemies.

abilities.name: Toxic Lash
abilities.description: While active, attacks deal additional <DT_POISON>Toxin damage; this effect is doubled for melee strikes. Instantly burst spores when attacking afflicted enemies.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Release a poisonous miasma that deals <DT_VIRAL>Viral damage to enemies in range. Foes afflicted by spores are more susceptible to the mist.

name: Rhino Prime
description: Takes Rhino's ground-shaking abilities to the next level with altered mod polarities that offer greater customization.

abilities.name: Rhino Charge
abilities.description: Rhino charges towards a target, clobbering any in his path and goring his victim.

abilities.name: Iron Skin
abilities.description: Rhino hardens his skin, insulating himself from all damage.

abilities.name: Roar
abilities.description: Grants all nearby Warframes increased damage for a short duration.

abilities.name: Rhino Stomp
abilities.description: Rhino stomps with force sufficient to disrupt time, tumbling enemies around him in stasis.

name: Hydroid Prime
description: Command the ocean’s fury with this king of gold and silver. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Tempest Barrage
abilities.description: Target an area and call down a barrage of liquid fury. Charge this attack to increase the lethality of the onslaught.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.description: Crash through enemies in a ferocious wall of water.

abilities.name: Undertow
abilities.description: Become a water trap and drown unsuspecting enemies.

abilities.name: Tentacle Swarm
abilities.description: Tap to spawn watery tentacles from all nearby surfaces to wreak havoc. Charge to increase the number of tentacles and spawn area. Use while in Undertow to have the tentacles emerge from the pool.

name: Oberon Prime
description: Protect the balance with this regal forest guardian. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Focuses deadly energy within a target and then projects it outwards, damaging both the target and surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Hallowed Ground
abilities.description: Sanctifies the ground before Oberon with righteous fire, inflicting damage to any enemy that stands in the flames.

abilities.name: Renewal
abilities.description: Healing waves of energy flow outward from Oberon to his allies, regenerating health over time.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description: Quickly lifts enemies into the air and then hurls them down with conviction. Enemies who succumb to this power have a chance to spawn a Health Sphere.

name: Ash Prime
description: Distraction and subterfuge become lethal weapons with Ash Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impaling enemies to walls.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Drops a smoke bomb that stuns enemies and obscures their vision, rendering Ash invisible for a short time.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Ash teleports towards the target, bringing him into melee range and making enemies vulnerable to finishers.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: Project fierce shadow clones of Ash upon groups of distant enemies. Join the fray using Teleport.

name: Nekros Prime
description: Death's new master. Featuring altered mod polarities allow for greater customization.

abilities.name: Soul Punch
abilities.description: A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.

abilities.name: Terrify
abilities.description: Cast fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.

abilities.name: Desecrate
abilities.description: Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.

abilities.name: Shadows Of The Dead
abilities.description: Summon shadow versions of vanquished enemies to fight alongside you for a short period.

name: Mag Prime
description: The exquisite Mag Prime offers the same abilities as Mag but with unique mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Pull
abilities.description: Magnetic force pulls enemies toward you, stunning them and bringing them into melee range.

abilities.name: Magnetize
abilities.description: Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.

abilities.name: Polarize
abilities.description: Emit an energy pulse that depletes enemy shields and armor, creating shards which become deadly when mixed with Magnetize. Shields of allies touched by the pulse are restored.

abilities.name: Crush
abilities.description: Magnetizes the bones of nearby enemies, causing them to collapse upon themselves.

name: Loki Prime
description: Confuse, deceive and destroy with Loki Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Decoy
abilities.description: Loki deploys a holographic copy of himself, drawing enemy fire.

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.description: Loki camouflages himself, becoming invisible to enemies.

abilities.name: Switch Teleport
abilities.description: Loki instantaneously swaps positions with a target, confusing the enemy.

abilities.name: Radial Disarm
abilities.description: Lets forth a wave of energy, disrupting the projectile weapons of enemies in range and forcing them to revert to melee combat.

name: Nyx Prime
description: Infiltrate the minds of your enemies with Nyx Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: Nyx invades the psyche of a target, confusing enemies and making them fight for the Tenno cause.

abilities.name: Psychic Bolts
abilities.description: Nyx launches a cluster of force bolts at enemies, using telekinesis to adjust flight paths and seek nearby targets.

abilities.name: Chaos
abilities.description: With a powerful psychic blast, Nyx causes mass hysteria on the battlefield by confusing all enemies to attack random factions.

abilities.name: Absorb
abilities.description: Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.

name: Mirage Prime
description: Dazzle the opposition with this golden master of illusion and mayhem. Featuring altered mod polarities allow for greater customization.

abilities.name: Hall Of Mirrors
abilities.description: Mirage creates an entourage of doppelgangers to confuse and distract the enemy.

abilities.name: Sleight Of Hand
abilities.description: Booby trap nearby objects while conjuring an irresistible jewel that bursts with radial blind when touched in darkness, or a radial explosion in light. Conjure multiple smaller jewels with the help of Hall of Mirrors.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Standing in light, Mirage deals heavy damage, while the shadows make Mirage difficult to track and even harder to hurt.

abilities.name: Prism
abilities.description: Fires an energy prism that shoots lasers in all directions. Activating again detonates the prism, blinding nearby foes.

name: Frost Prime
description: Frost Prime has the same chilling abilities as Frost but provides unique mod polarities, allowing for greater customization.

abilities.name: Freeze
abilities.description: A frigid energy blast that freezes targets in their tracks.

abilities.name: Ice Wave
abilities.description: Sends a wave of razor sharp, crystalized ice toward an enemy, dealing heavy damage.

abilities.name: Snow Globe
abilities.description: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Summons a treacherous landslide of ice that instantly freezes and shatters all enemies in its radius.

name: Excalibur Prime
description: Excalibur Prime is the epitome of mobility and offense, and features the same abilities as Excalibur, but has unique mod polarities installed allowing for greater customization.

abilities.name: Slash Dash
abilities.description: Dash between enemies while slashing with the Exalted Blade.

abilities.name: Radial Blind
abilities.description: Emits a bright flash of light, blinding all enemies in a small radius for several seconds.

abilities.name: Radial Javelin
abilities.description: Launches javelins towards enemies, dealing high damage and impaling them to walls.

abilities.name: Exalted Blade
abilities.description: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.

name: Ember Prime
description: Ember Prime offers the same potential for wanton destruction as Ember but provides unique mod polarities, allowing for greater customization.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Charge and release a fiery projectile that ignites enemies on contact and leaves behind a treacherous patch of flame.

abilities.name: Accelerant
abilities.description: Stun nearby enemies with strong accelerant. Increases all fire damage dealt.

abilities.name: Fire Blast
abilities.description: Slam the ground to create a wave of plasma that incinerates nearby enemies and forms a persistent ring of fire. Add heat damage to weapons by firing them through the ring.

abilities.name: World On Fire
abilities.description: Blast nearby foes with a burst of fire, and follow that up with a barrage of fireballs against any enemy who dares approach. Over time, these fireballs burn hotter as they consume more energy.

name: Valkyr Prime
description: A proud fighter emerges unscarred by time or malice. Featuring altered mod polarities allow for greater customization.

abilities.name: Rip Line
abilities.description: Valkyr hurls forth a hook. If it hits an enemy, she pulls them to her. If it hits terrain, she pulls herself to the hook's location.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Valkyr lets out a rallying cry that bolsters her allies melee speed while slowing down nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Paralysis
abilities.description: Valkyr unleashes her shields, stunning and damaging enemies around her.

abilities.name: Hysteria
abilities.description: Valkyr is imbued with energy and becomes a ball of vicious rage, capable of unleashing a torrent of deadly claw attacks on unsuspecting foes.

name: Banshee Prime
description: Banshee Prime assails her foes by manipulating sonic forces to deadly effect. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Sonic Boom
abilities.description: Banshee emits a sonic shockwave that pushes targets in range with enough force to incapacitate or kill attackers.

abilities.name: Sonar
abilities.description: Using acoustic location, Banshee's Sonar power finds and tracks enemies, and exposes critical weak spots to everyone in your squad.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Using Silence surrounds Banshee in an aura that stuns enemies and will limit their perceptions and tactical response to gunfire and Warframe attacks.

abilities.name: Sound Quake
abilities.description: Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the environment, Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the ground.

name: Nova Prime
description: Nova Prime wreaks devastation on her enemies using volatile antimatter. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Null Star
abilities.description: Creates antimatter particles that orbit Nova and seek nearby targets. Each active particle gives +5% damage reduction to Nova's health, stacking up to 90%.

abilities.name: Antimatter Drop
abilities.description: Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision with increased deadliness when targeted by weapons.

abilities.name: Worm Hole
abilities.description: Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.

abilities.name: Molecular Prime
abilities.description: Primes all enemies in a radius with volatile antimatter.

name: Pharoma
description: A compound that relaxes nearby fish.

name: Luminos Dye
description: Dyes the waters with a compound that sticks to fish passing through it, making them easier to see from the shore.

name: Cuthol Bait
description: This bait is comprised of materials that are known to attract Cuthols, a fish found only in pond hotspots during the night.

name: Norg Bait
description: This bait is comprised of materials that are known to attract Norg, a fish found only in lake hotspots during the night.

name: Glappid Bait
description: This bait is comprised of exotic materials that are known to attract the elusive Glappid, a fish found only in ocean hotspots during the night.

name: Peppered Bait
description: This bait attracts fish that are active during the day.

name: Twilight Bait
description: This bait attracts predatory fish that are active in either day or night.

name: Murkray Bait
description: This bait is comprised of materials that are known to attract Murkrays, a fish found only in ocean hotspots during both day and night.

name: Jordas Golem Assassinate
description: Access this assassination mission by completing the Jordas Precept quest.

name: Mutalist Alad V Assassinate
description: Put an end to Alad V and his Mutalist experiments

name: Apostasy Prologue
description: Inspect your personal quarters upon finishing the Chains of Harrow quest.

name: The Archwing
description: The Balor Fomorians are coming but we are ready. Through your efforts we finally have a working Archwing prototype and I am sending you the blueprint. However, your task is not yet complete. You still must discover the component parts.

name: Octavia'S Anthem
description: Build the Mandachord and find the cause of Cephalon Suda’s erratic behavior.

name: The New Strange
description: Work with Cephalon Simaris to find the source of a mysterious voice.

name: The Silver Grove
description: New Loka seeks help protecting a sacred forest from Grineer incursions, but are they ready to face the forest’s true nature?

name: A Man Of Few Words
description: Darvo needs your help again. Save one of his best contractors from Grineer execution.

name: Saya'S Vigil
description: On the Plains of Eidolon a mystery has lain buried for years: one that will mend or destroy a heart, and open the door to a hidden past.

name: The Jordas Precept
description: Ordis is determined to help a fellow Cephalon overcome a ship wide infestation.

name: The Glast Gambit
description: Nef Anyo has stolen the children of the Mycona Colony and it is up to you to get them back. You must challenge Nef on The Index and beat him at his own game. But Tenno, beware, not all is as it seems.

name: Patient Zero
description: Find Alad V’s laboratory and put a stop to his madness

name: Once Awake
description: Intercepted Grineer communications reveal that Grineer have been experimenting with some sort of bio weapon. You must investigate.

name: Howl Of The Kubrow
description: You are Tenno, you deserve a Kubrow by your side.

name: The Limbo Theorem
description:
The Limbo Theorem quest cannot be completed without an Archwing
Piece together the Limbo Theorem to uncover its source

name: Hidden Messages
description: Seek out the Warframe Mirage

name: Sands Of Inaros
description: Help Baro Ki'Teer raid an ancient Martian tomb for a mysterious treasure.

name: The Second Dream
description: The Sentient Hunhow seeks to destroy the Tenno by exploiting long forgotten secrets.

name: Chains Of Harrow
description: A strange transmission leads deep into the dark world of Red Veil mysticism. What evils will be found there and what do they want?

name: Natah
description: Strange drones have appeared in the Origin System, help the Lotus find out what they are and who sent them.

name: Stolen Dreams
description: Find the thief Maroo and uncover the secrets of the Arcane Codices.

name: Vor'S Prize
description:
MY QUEENS -
You were right, the Tenno threat is real. We found one drifting near Pluto but the Lotus knew we were coming. She purged the Cryo moments before we had them and sent a squad of Tenno to break our assault.
They escaped. We are working on tracing them. Separate this Tenno from the flock and it should be easy to kill. We shattered its Warframe and expect such an abrupt Cryo purge will have damaged its memories.
We anxiously await punishment for failing this task.
- VOR

name: The War Within
description: A disturbance in the Somatic Link prompts the Lotus to send operatives back to the Tenno Reservoir.

name: Orokin Derelict Survival
description: A Survival mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship

name: Orokin Derelict Sabotage
description: A Sabotage mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship

name: Orokin Derelict Mobile Defense
description: A Mobile Defense mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship

name: Orokin Derelict Assassinate
description: An Assassination mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship

name: Orokin Derelict Exterminate
description: An Exterminate mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship

name: Orokin Derelict Defense
description: An Endless Defense mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship

name: Orokin Derelict Capture
description: A Capture mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship

name: Hikou Prime
description: As deadly as any bullet without the associated noise or commotion.

name: Spira Prime
description: These rare, braided throwing daggers were a favorite tool of high ranking Orokin assassins.

name: Vasto Prime
description: This elegant rapid-fire revolver is the embodiment of superior Orokin craftsmanship.

name: Sicarus Prime
description: The Sicarus Prime is an ornamental firearm that fires rounds in rapid bursts, providing a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.

name: Lex Prime
description: The Lex Prime is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low fire rate and clip size. Very efficient at long range.

name: Ballistica Prime
description: The beauty of this luxuriously gilded crossbow cannot obscure its lethal purpose.

name: Akstiletto Prime
description: Stylish, discreet and accurate, perfect for the Tenno of distinction.

name: Akbolto Prime
description: Gilded rails adorn these two vicious bolt launching pistols.

name: Euphona Prime
description: Banshee Prime’s signature shotgun is an instrument of devastation that fires both focused and broad shots.

name: Lato Vandal
description: A special version of the standard Lato pistol with a slower fire rate but offering higher accuracy and damage values. The Lato Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.

name: Lato Prime
description: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.

name: Bronco Prime
description: Infused with rare Orokin alloys, the Bronco Prime is a highly efficient weapon, trading an increased clip size and damage for a lower rate of fire.

name: Akbronco Prime
description: Used together, these Orokin pistols feed off each other, inflicting greater damage with an enhanced chance for inducing elemental effects on targets.

name: Aklex Prime
description: Savage the enemy with a Lex Prime in each hand.

name: Vaykor Marelok
description: Taken from defeated Grineer commanders and rebuilt to improve combat efficiency and reliability.

name: Rakta Ballistica
description: This modified ballistica is the weapon of choice used by Red Veil Assassins to take out high-priority marks.

name: Secura Dual Cestra
description: The favored side-arms of Perrin Sequence executives, these pistols have been modified to improve efficiency and killing potential.

name: Sancti Castanas
description: This remotely detonated electrical trap is used by devotees of New Loka to protect their temples and shrines.

name: Synoid Gammacor
description: Deployed by the Cephalon Suda, once a data-analyzing instrument the Gammacor main focus is defense.

name: Telos Akbolto
description: For the Arbiters of Hexis these pistols are more than simple weapons, they are symbols of truth and discipline.

name: Twin Vipers Wraith
description: The uniquely styled Twin Vipers Wraith are a powerful variation on the standard akimbo machine-pistols.

name: Viper Wraith
description: The uniquely styled Viper Wraith is a powerful variation on the standard machine-pistol.

name: Sweeper Prime
description: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Prime Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.

name: Prime Laser Rifle
description: A Prime Laser Rifle.

name: Deconstructor Prime
description: Allows the Helios Prime to violently disassemble and turn itself into a deadly projectile.

name: Strun Wraith
description: A different take on a familiar shotgun, the Strun Wraith features unique styling.

name: Boar Prime
description: One of the finest examples of Tenno craftsmanship, the Boar Prime offers a higher fire rate, clip size and a much higher per-shot damage.

name: Snipetron Vandal
description: A customized version of the elusive Snipetron, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.

name: Braton Vandal
description: A special version of the standard Braton rifle with a slower fire rate but offering higher accuracy and damage values. The Braton Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.

name: Latron Prime
description: The ornamental Latron Prime exploits ancient Orokin technology to get a slight damage increase over the standard Latron.

name: Braton Prime
description: A classic Orokin weapon, Braton Prime features modified damage levels and a larger magazine over the standard model.

name: Latron Wraith
description: The Latron Wraith is a powerful variation of the standard, semi-automatic rifle that features unique styling.

name: Vectis Prime
description: Once thought destroyed, the newly uncovered Vectis Prime revives Tenno martial traditions.

name: Tigris Prime
description: An artifact of exquisite beauty. A weapon of deadly purpose.

name: Tiberon Prime
description: Art meets ingenuity with this beautifully deadly rifle.

name: Sybaris Prime
description: Sleek and slender, a golden symbol of Tenno perfection.

name: Soma Prime
description: Known for taking down whole squads with its single massive clip, few weapons were as feared as the Prime Soma.

name: Burston Prime
description: Once thought lost to the ages, attempts to reengineer the Burston Prime never fully replicated this weapon's power and agility.

name: Boltor Prime
description: Fires Orokin designed bolts that are faster and sharper.

name: Paris Prime
description: Discovered deep inside an ancient Orokin derelict, the Paris Prime increases the kinetic energy of any bolt it fires, dealing more damage than its more common counterpart.

name: Cernos Prime
description: A noble bow to hunt hellish beasts.

name: Vaykor Hek
description: Forged in the fires of rebel struggle, this shotgun is a force for liberation.

name: Rakta Cernos
description: A finely tuned instrument of assassination.

name: Secura Penta
description: Ruthless and efficient, just like the free-market.

name: Sancti Tigris
description: Echo nature's violent beauty with this special Tigris.

name: Synoid Simulor
description: Cephalon Suda’s custom issue Simulor was built to satisfy her curiosity.

name: Telos Boltor
description: Bring down judgement, with this boltor crafted by the Arbiters of Hexis.

name: Gorgon Wraith
description: The Gorgon Wraith is a powerful variant of its precursor that features unique styling.

name: Vulkar Wraith
description: A blood-red variant of this devastating sniper rifle.

name: Karak Wraith
description: A different take on the Grineer assault rifle, the Karak Wraith features unique styling.

name: Supra Vandal
description: A customized version of the powerful Supra, featuring a metallic finish and Lotus decal.

name: Quanta Vandal
description: A customized version of the Quanta, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.

name: Dera Vandal
description: A customized version of the Dera, featuring a metallic finish and Lotus decal.

name: Ignis Wraith
description: A blood-red variant of this destructive flamethrower.

name: Kronen Prime
description: Ancient blades, perfected for today’s combat.

name: Nami Skyla Prime
description: Forged by a forgotten master, these exquisite blades are bounty from a golden-age long gone.

name: Nikana Prime
description: An ancient blade predating the fall of the Orokin Empire. Forged using techniques lost over the centuries, the edge remains sharper than that of any modern Nikana.

name: Galatine Prime
description: Only Tenno were strong enough to wield this noble beast of a weapon.

name: Bo Prime
description: A classic Orokin weapon, Bo Prime creates elegant fury on the battlefield.

name: Reaper Prime
description: Reaper Prime is an ornamental scythe, with a blade forged from tempered rubidium.

name: Venka Prime
description: Gleaming blades of white draw blood of the deepest red.

name: Silva & Aegis Prime
description: A perfectly crafted pairing, this mace and shield combination is sculpted for exhibition but balanced for the battlefield.

name: Kogake Prime
description: Deliver a golden knockout with these prime melee weapons.

name: Fragor Prime
description: A beautifully forged instrument of devastation.

name: Dual Kamas Prime
description: The sensual lines of these golden Kamas have long been celebrated as a masterwork of Tenno weapon smithing.

name: Orthos Prime
description: Orthos Prime is an ancient Orokin martial weapon, forged from the purest rubidium making it extremely light-weight.

name: Skana Prime
description: A basic blade known as a Skana. It is widely used by the Tenno. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.

name: Glaive Prime
description: The Glaive Prime is a deadly and beautiful weapon from the Orokin era. The blades are as effective in close quarters as they are when thrown at distant enemies.

name: Ankyros Prime
description: This Orokin variation of the Ankyros is superior to its successor in every way.

name: Furax Wraith
description: These Wraith gauntlets have been augmented for power.

name: Fang Prime
description: A set of ceremonial daggers from the Orokin era, the Fang Prime's blades resonate violently as they strike. This allows them to pierce hardened materials like armor with ease.

name: Dakra Prime
description: The Dakra Prime is a Tenno forged weapon, crafted during the time of the Orokin. It is renowned for speed, power and the ability to hit multiple targets.

name: Scindo Prime
description: An ancient executioners weapon, the honor of decapitation by the Scindo Prime was reserved for the Orokin's most respected enemies.

name: Vaykor Sydon
description: Justice blinds. Each blocked hit charges a Radial Blind, when fully charged drop block to unleash it.

name: Rakta Dark Dagger
description: Infiltrate undetected; reduced visibility when held. Then strike with confidence; hits to irradiated targets restores shields and creates overshields.

name: Secura Lecta
description: Whip the enemy out of their ill-gotten gains; double credit drops on kills.

name: Sancti Magistar
description: Each charged attack turns the enemy’s pain into a healing pulse that washes over allies. Also, creates resistance to status effects when held.

name: Synoid Heliocor
description: This intelligent hammer takes an enemy killed by a channelled attack and recomposes them as an ally. Any fatal strike with this weapon also performs a codex scan.

name: Telos Boltace
description: Spinning attacks unleash the Stormpath, a tempest of mayhem that hurls any foes in its way.

name: Machete Wraith
description: A different take on a familiar combat knife, the Machete Wraith features unique styling.

name: Prova Vandal
description: A customized version of the vicious Prova, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.
